channel.title: Anyone please take a look here.. i need help
channel.description:
hey guy, i got 2 questions :D i got this piece of error : well the first bit im confused by it cuz it wont detect the "&&" why?? [code]palidino76\rs2\io\packets\ActionButtons.java:37: error: unexpected type if (p.rights == 2 && p.buttonsid = true){ ^ required: variable found: value 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code] and like 20 lines longer down in the file it has this code and it works fine..: [code]if (buttonId == 39 && p.equipment[1] == 9747) {[/code] AND I KNOW that my "p.buttonsid = true is "b.u.t.t.o.n.s.i.d " and not buttonid
Actionbuttons.java: [code]if (p.rights == 2 && p.buttonsid = true){ p.frames.sendMessage(p,"You pressed "+ buttonId +" "+ buttonId2 +" on interface "+ interfaceId); }[/code]
player.java: [code]public boolean buttonsid = false;[/code]
And my second question has nothing to do with servers but how do i check my posts? like old ones? on here

item.title: Anyone please take a look here.. i need help
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

p.buttonsid = true

This is assignment and incorrect when using for comparison. You could use any of the following

p.buttonsid == true

if (p.buttonsid)

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone please take a look here.. i need help
